body: Why does this exist? Why can’t there be good takao sister doujins without severely fucked up shit in them? Either it’s a shota or this shit. I don’t care if I sound like a vanilla fag but this is ABHORRENT to even look at, and the only reason I’m here is to voice my opinion and my verdict is. If you like this. I’m sorry, um. Please. Just lock yourself in a mental ward.
NTR and Dilf? Not a good combo bruh
